ALLOCLST.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+¢)
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  ¢ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  { TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  ! TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS)
  / TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(RIGHT)
)BODY
+------------------------- DATA SET ALLOCATION SUMMARY -------------------------
+COMMAND ===>{ZCMD                                    +SCROLL ===>{AMT +
+
+                THE FOLLOWING DATA SETS ARE ALLOCATED TO &ZUSER
+   DDNAME          DATA SET NAME          DISP DSORG RECFM LRECL BLKSZ VOLSER
+---------- ------------------------------ ---- ----- ----- ----- ----- ------
)MODEL
+ ¢Z       !Z                             ¢Z    ¢Z    ¢Z   /Z    /Z    ¢Z
)INIT
 .ZVARS = '(ZALDD ZALDSN ZALDISP ZALDORG ZALFMT ZALRECL ZALBLK ZALVOL)'
 .HELP = TALLOC
 &AMT = PAGE
)END

GENER1.text:
)ATTR
  +  TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  %  TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _  TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH)
)BODY
%------------------------  FOREGROUND IEBGENER  --------------------------------
% COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                            +
+
% ENTER PARAMETERS DESCRIBING THE INPUT DATASET BELOW:
+   DATASET NAME    %===>_INDSN                                                +
+   UNIT TYPE       %===>_INUNIT+     %PARAMETERS BELOW ARE FOR TAPE
+   VOLUME SERIAL   %===>_INVOL +     DENSITY       %===>_INDENS+
+   RECORD FORMAT   %===>_INRECFM +   LABEL TYPE    %===>_INLABEL+
+   RECORD LENGTH   %===>_INLR +      LABEL POSITION%===>_INPOS+
+   BLOCK SIZE      %===>_INBLK +     EXPDT         %===>_INEXP+
+   SYSPRINT        %===>_IPRT +      PROGRAM       %===>_PROGNAME+
% ENTER PARAMETERS DESCRIBING THE OUTPUT DATASET BELOW:
+   DATASET NAME    %===>_OUTDSN                                      +
+   UNIT TYPE       %===>_OUTUNIT+    %PARAMETERS BELOW ARE FOR TAPE
+   VOLUME SERIAL   %===>_OUTVOL+     DENSITY       %===>_OUTDENS+
+   RECORD FORMAT   %===>_OUTRECFM+   LABEL TYPE    %===>_OUTLABEL+
+   RECORD LENGTH   %===>_OUTLR+      LABEL POSITION%===>_OUTPOS+
+   BLOCK SIZE      %===>_OUTBLK+     EXPDT         %===>_OUTEX+
+   SPACE UNITS     %===>_SPCU      + ALLOC BLKSIZE %===>_ALCBL+
+   PRIMARY QUAN    %===>_PRIQ +      DESTINATION PARAMETER FOR SYSOUT
+   SECONDARY QUAN  %===>_SECQ +      DESTINATION ID%===>_DEST    +
+   DIRECTORY BLOCKS%===>_DIRB +      FORMS FOR 9700%===>_FORM+
+   DISPOSITION     %===>_DISP   +    (KEEP OR CATALOG IF NEW)
)PROC
    VER (&SPCU,LIST,BLOCK,CYLINDER,TRACK)
    IF  (&SPCU = BLOCK)
      VER (&ALCBL,NONBLANK,NUM)
)END

PHNPROOF.text:
)ATTR

)BODY
--------------------- Print DELUXE Phone List Proof ----------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD

+  Press%ENTER+to print proof or%END+to exit without printing.

PHON@MEN.text:
)ATTR
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)
  _ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  ¢ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  ¬ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(ASIS ) PAD(' ')
  @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON )
)BODY
%--------------------------- DELUXE Phone List Menu ----------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                           +
+
+      %Selection ===>_Z@
+
+                     %1+ INQUIRY     - Specific Phone List Inquiry
+                     %2+ BROWSE      - Browse Phone List
+                     ¢Z+ &PHON3MSG
+                     ¢Z+ &PHON4MSG
+                     ¢Z+ &PHON5MSG
+                     ¢Z+ &PHON6MSG
+
+
+    %In order by ===>_Z@        +&ORDERMSG
+
+                     %N+ Name (default)
+                     %E+ Extension
+
+
+  %Starting with ===>¬PHONSTR   +&STARTMSG
+
+                     Part or all of name or extension
+                     number depending on the order,
+                     blank = top of listing.
)INIT
  .ZVARS = 'PHONOPT PHONOPT3 PHONOPT4 PHONOPT5 PHONOPT6 PHONORD'
  .CURSOR = PHONOPT
  .HELP = PHONTUTM
  &PHONOPT = ' '
  &PHONORD = ' '
  &PHONSTR = ' '
  &PHONOPT3 = ' '
  &PHON3MSG = ' '
  &PHONOPT4 = ' '
  &PHON4MSG = ' '
  &PHONOPT5 = ' '
  &PHON5MSG = ' '
  IF  (&PHONAUTH = 'U')
     &PHONOPT3 = '3'
     &PHON3MSG = 'EDIT        - Edit Phone List (must be authorized)'
     &PHONOPT4 = '4'
     &PHON4MSG = 'PRINT PROOF - Print Proof of Phone List'
     &PHONOPT5 = '5'
     &PHON5MSG = 'PRINT EMP   - Print Employee''s Directory'
     &PHONOPT6 = '6'
     &PHON6MSG = 'PRINT OPER  - Print Operator''s Directory'
     &ORDERMSG = '(Valid for options 2, 3, 4 and 5)'
     &STARTMSG = '(Valid for options 2 and 3)'
)PROC
   IF  (&PHONAUTH = ' ')
      VER (&PHONOPT,LIST,1,2,MSG=PHN009Q)
   IF (&PHONOPT = 1 6)
      VER (&PHONORD PICT ' ',MSG=PHN009R)
   IF (&PHONOPT = 1 4 5 6)
      VER (&PHONSTR PICT ' ',MSG=PHN009S)
   VER (&PHONORD LIST E N,MSG=PHN009Q)
   IF  (&PHONORD = ' ')
      &PHONORD = 'N'
   IF  (&PHONORD = 'N')
     &PHONVAR7 = 'Name Order'
   IF  (&PHONORD = 'E')
     &PHONVAR7 = 'Extension Number Order'
   VPUT (PHONORD PHONSTR PHONVAR7) SHARED
   &ZSEL=TRANS(TRUNC(&PHONOPT,'.')
             1,'PGM(PHONINQ)'
             2,'PGM(PHONBRWS)'
             3,'PGM(PHONEDIT)'
             4,'CMD(PHNPROOF)'
             5,'CMD(PHONEMP)'
             6,'CMD(PHONOPER)'
             *,'?')
)END

PHONEADD.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* _ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
   ¬ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(ASIS) PAD(' ')
)BODY
%------------------ &ACTION DELUXE Phone List ----------------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
%
+
+
      LOCATION ===>_Z   +
     FIRST AID ===>_Z+
     EXTENSION ===>¬Z   +
      BUILDING ===>¬Z   +
     NAME/ROOM ===>_NAME                                    +
       EXCLUDE ===>_Z+
   BUDGET DEPT ===>_Z   +
      SUPPRESS ===>_Z+

 BEEPER NUMBER ===>_Z       +
    SPEED DIAL ===>+#1 -_Z  +
+
+  &PHNINST1
+  &PHNINST2
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(PLANT FIRSTAID EXTENS PAGENUM EXCLUDE BUDGDEPT SUPFLAG  +
      BEEPNUM SPEEDNUM)'
  .HELP = PHONTUT1
  .CURSOR = PLANT
  IF (&LCMD = 'I')
    &ACTION = 'Add Record to'
    &PHNINST1 = 'Key information for record to be added and press ENTER,'
    &PHNINST2 = 'or press END to ignore insertion.'
  IF (&LCMD = 'C')
    &ACTION = 'Change Record on'
    &PHNINST1 = 'Overtype information to be changed and press ENTER,'
    &PHNINST2 = 'or press END to ignore change.'
)PROC
  VER (&PLANT LIST ADM AEB DMT FMS FOX PAS PSB REG8 SHV STP,MSG=PHN009C)
  IF (&EXTENS ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLANT NB,MSG=PHN009K)
  VER (&FIRSTAID LIST *,MSG=PHN009D)
  &FIRST = TRUNC (&EXTENS,1)
  IF (&FIRST ¬= ' ')
    IF (&EXTENS ¬= '-0--')
      IF (&EXTENS ¬= '----')
        VER (&EXTENS PICT NNNN,MSG=PHN009B)
  IF (&FIRST = ' ')
    VER (&EXTENS PICT CNNN,MSG=PHN009B)
  &FIRST = TRUNC (&PAGENUM,1)
  IF (&FIRST ¬= ' ')
    IF (&PAGENUM ¬= '-0--')
      IF (&PAGENUM ¬= '----')
        VER (&PAGENUM PICT NNNN,MSG=PHN009I)
  IF (&FIRST = ' ')
    VER (&PAGENUM PICT CNNN,MSG=PHN009I)
  VER (&NAME NB,MSG=PHN009H)
  &FIRST = TRUNC (&NAME,1)
  &RESTNM = .TRAIL
  IF (&RESTNM ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLANT NB,MSG=PHN009C)
  IF (&RESTNM = ' ')
    VER (&FIRST PICT A,MSG=PHN009L)
  IF (&EXTENS ¬= ' ')
    IF (&RESTNM = ' ')
      .CURSOR = NAME
      VER (&RESTNM NB,MSG=PHN009L)
  VER (&EXCLUDE LIST * @,MSG=PHN009E)
  IF (&PLANT = ADM)
    IF (&EXTENS ¬= ' ')
      IF (&EXTENS ¬= '-0--')
        IF (&EXTENS ¬= '----')
          IF (&BUDGDEPT = ' ')
            .CURSOR = BUDGDEPT
            VER (&BUDGDEPT NB,MSG=PHN009G)
  IF (&PLANT = AEB)
    IF (&EXTENS ¬= ' ')
      IF (&EXTENS ¬= '-0--')
        IF (&EXTENS ¬= '----')
          IF (&BUDGDEPT = ' ')
            .CURSOR = BUDGDEPT
            VER (&BUDGDEPT NB,MSG=PHN009G)
  VER (&SUPFLAG LIST *,MSG=PHN009F)
  IF (&BEEPNUM ¬= ' ')
     VER (&BEEPNUM PICT NNN-NNNN,MSG=PHN008A)
  IF (&SPEEDNUM ¬= ' ')
     VER (&SPEEDNUM NUM,MSG=PHN008B)
 VPUT (EXTENS PLANT NAME FIRSTAID PAGENUM EXCLUDE BUDGDEPT SUPFLAG)
)END

PHONEDEL.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* _ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
   ¬ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(ASIS ) PAD('_')
)BODY
%---------------- Delete Record from DELUXE Phone List -------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
%
+
+
   EXTENSION:   %&EXTENS+
   LOCATION:    %&PLANT+
   NAME/ROOM:   %&NAME                                    +
   FIRST AID:   %&FIRSTAID+
   PAGING NO:   %&PAGENUM+
   EXCLUDE:     %&EXCLUDE+
   BUDGET DEPT: %&BUDGDEPT+
   SUPPRESS:    %&SUPFLAG+
+
+  Enter%DELETE+to delete record, or press%END+to ignore deletion.
)INIT
  .HELP = PHONTUT1
  .CURSOR = ZCMD
  &ZCMD = &Z
)PROC

)END

PHONEDIT.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* _ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
   ¬ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(ASIS ) PAD('_')
   | TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(ASIS ) PAD(' ')
   $ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
)BODY
%--------------------------- Edit DELUXE Phone List ----------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                         / /%SCROLL ===>_AMT +
%
+       %&PHONVAR7                   %Restart at ===>|PHONSTR   +
+
%CMD    + I = INSERT   D = DELETE   C = CHANGE
%                                                     FIRST PAGE       BDGT
%  EXT   LOC  NAME/ROOM                                AID   NO  EXCLD DEPT SPRS
+
)MODEL
¬Z$Z   +$Z   $NAME                                    +$Z+ $Z   + $Z+ $Z   + $Z+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(LCMD EXTENS PLANT FIRSTAID PAGENUM EXCLUDE BUDGDEPT SUPFLAG)'
  .HELP = PHONTUT1
  .CURSOR = PHONSTR
  &LCMD = ' '
  &ZCMD = &Z
  &AMT = PAGE
  &PHONSTR = ' '
  &ROWID = 1
)REINIT
  IF (.MSG = ' ')
    &LCMD = '_'
    REFRESH(LCMD)
)PROC
  VER (&ZCMD,LIST,I,SAVE)
  IF (&ZTDELS ¬= 0000)
    IF (&LCMD ¬= 'I')
      IF (&LCMD ¬= 'D')
        IF (&LCMD ¬= 'C')
          .CSRROW = &ROWID
  IF (&ZTDELS ¬= 0000)
    VER (&LCMD,LIST,I,D,C,MSG=PHN009A)
  VPUT (PHONSTR) SHARED
)END

PHONINQ1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
      /*  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH)      defaults displayed for        */
      /*  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)       information only              */
      /*  _ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)               */
  @ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) PAD(_) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS)
)BODY
+------------------------   DELUXE PHONE LIST INQUIRY   ------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
+  Specify any valid combination of the following:
+
+  1)  EXTENSION
+                    %===>@Z   +     (Phone extension or part with%*+suffix)
+  2)  PLANT
+                    %===>@Z   +     (Plant designation or part with%*+suffix)
+  3)  NAME
+      - LAST NAME   %===>@Z                   +
+                                    (Last name,%all+or part with%*+suffix)
+      - FIRST NAME  %===>@Z                   +
+                                    (First name or part with%*+suffix)
+  4)  ROOM
+                    %===>@Z                                       +
+                                    (Room,%all+or part with%*+suffix)
+
%  NOTE:+ NAME and ROOM values are mutually exclusive
+
+
+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(EXTENS# PLANT# LNAME# FNAME# NAME#)'
  .HELP = PHONTUT4
)PROC
 IF (&EXTENS# = ' ')
     &EXTENS# = '*'
 IF (&PLANT# = ' ')
     &PLANT# = '*'
 IF (&LNAME# = ' ')
     &LNAME# = '*'
 IF (&FNAME# = ' ')
     &FNAME# = '*'
 IF (&NAME# = ' ')
     &NAME# = '*'
 &LNAMEX = TRUNC (&LNAME#,1)
 &FNAMEX = TRUNC (&FNAME#,1)
 IF (&NAME# ¬= '*')
     &PHONMSGS = 'Specification error'
     &PHONMSGL = 'NAME & ROOM are mutually exclusive. Erase the value f+
               or one of them'
     VER (&LNAMEX,LIST,'*',MSG=PHON000)
     VER (&FNAMEX,LIST,'*',MSG=PHON000)
)END

PHONOPER.text:
)ATTR
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)
  _ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
)BODY
%---------- Print DELUXE Operator's Phone Directory ----------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
+
+
+           Administration ===>_Z$
+      Administration East ===>_Z$
+                  Delmart ===>_Z$
+                    Forms ===>_Z$
+                   Pascal ===>_Z$
+      Production Services ===>_Z$
+                  Red Fox ===>_Z$
+                 Region 8 ===>_Z$
+                Shoreview ===>_Z$
+                 St. Paul ===>_Z$



+  Enter number of copies to be printed for each location.  Total must
+  not be more than 20.  Press%ENTER+to submit or%END+to exit without
+  submitting.  Directory will be printed on the Xerox 9700.

)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(PHONADM PHONAEB PHONDMT +
    PHONFMS PHONPAS PHONPSB PHONFOX PHONREG8 +
    PHONSHV PHONSTP)'
  .CURSOR = PHONADM
  &PHONTOT = 0
)PROC
  IF (&PHONADM ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONADM, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONAEB ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONAEB, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONDMT ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONDMT, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONFMS ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONFMS, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONPAS ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONPAS, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONPSB ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONPSB, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONFOX ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONFOX, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONREG8 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONREG8, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONSHV ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONSHV, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  IF (&PHONSTP ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PHONSTP, PICT N,MSG=PHN009P)
  VPUT (PHONADM PHONAEB PHONDMT PHONFMS PHONPAS PHONPSB PHONFOX PHONREG8
    PHONSHV PHONSTP) SHARED
)END

PHONPRT2.text:
)ATTR
  +  TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  %  TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT) PAD(' ')
)BODY
%--------------------  PRINT TELEPHONE DIRECTORY  ------------------------------
%COMMAND%===>_ZCMD                                                             +
+
%  ENTER+BELOW the plant numbers that you would like to print lists for.
%         NOTE:+ Use multiple entries of a plant number to get multiple
+                copies of the list for any plant.
+
+  PLANT 1 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 2 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 3 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 4 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 5 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 6 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 7 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 8 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 9 %===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 10%===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 11%===>_Z  +
+  PLANT 12%===>_Z  +
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(PLT1 PLT2 PLT3 PLT4 PLT5 PLT6 PLT7 PLT8 PLT9 PLT10 +
             PLT11 PLT12)'
)PROC
  IF (&PLT1 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT1,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT2 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT2,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT3 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT3,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT4 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT4,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT5 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT5,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT6 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT6,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT7 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT7,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT8 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT8,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT9 ¬= ' ')
    VER (&PLT9,ALPHA,MSG=PHONE003)
  IF (&PLT10 ¬= ' ')

  IF (&PLT11 ¬= ' ')

PHONTUTB.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+|)

   To start display at a specific extension or name, key that value following

PHONTUTM.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)

)BODY
%--------------------- DELUXE Phone List Menu Tutorial -------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                           +
+
+
+

+     Key up to 10 characters of the last name following 'Starting with ===>'.
+     Press ENTER.
+
+
+   To find the name or room for an extension:

)INIT

PHONTUT1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+|)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* | TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
)BODY
%-------------------- Edit DELUXE Phone List Tutorial --------------------------
%COMMAND ===>|ZCMD
+
+       %&PHONVAR7                   %Restart at ===>
+
%CMD    + I = INSERT   D = DELETE   C = CHANGE
%                                                     FIRST PAGE       BDGT
%  EXT   LOC  NAME/ROOM                                AID   NO  EXCLD DEPT SPRS
+
%_+1234  ADM  MORRISON, JAMES C                         *   1234   *   X111   *
+
   To start display at a specific extension or name, key that value following
    'Restart at ===>'

   To insert a new record key 'I' in any CMD field.

   To change information for an existing record, key 'C' in its CMD field.

   To delete a record, key 'D' in its CMD field.


   Press%ENTER+for next page or%END+to return.
)INIT
  IF  (&PHONORD = ' ' 'N')
    &PHONVAR7 = 'Name Order'
  IF  (&PHONORD = 'E')
    &PHONVAR7 = 'Extension Number Order'
)PROC
  &ZCONT = PHONTUT2
)END

PHONTUT2.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* _ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
)BODY
%--------------------- Edit DELUXE Phone List Tutorial -------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
+
   (continued from previous page)

   LOCATION:     Must key plant number or building.
   FIRST AID:    Key '*' for certified first aid persons, else space.
   EXTENSION:    Must key Deluxe extension number.
   BUILDING:     Optional paging number, else space.
   NAME/ROOM:    Must key name or room.  If name, key LASTNAME, FIRSTNAME.  If
                 room, do not key any commas.
   EXCLUDE:      Key '@' if record is to be excluded from employee's directory.
                 Key '*' if record is to be excluded from both the operator's
                 and employee's directories.
                 Leave space to include in both directories.
   BUDGET DEPT:  Key three character department number for extensions in the
                 Administration Building, else space.
   SUPPRESS:     Key '*' if details and totals for this extension are to be
                 suppressed on 'Outgoing Phone Call Usage by Extension' Report,
                 else space.  (All information will be totaled into Department
                 and Building).


   Press%END+to return.
)INIT
)PROC
)END

PHONTUT3.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* _ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
)BODY
%--------------------- Edit DELUXE Phone List Tutorial -------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
+
   (continued from previous page)

   EXTENSION:    Deluxe extension number
   LOCATION:     Plant number or building
   NAME/ROOM:    Name - LASTNAME, FIRSTNAME
                 Room - do not key any commas
   FIRST AID:    '*' = certified first aid persons
   PAGING NO:    Optional paging number, else space.
   EXCLUDE:      '@' = Exclude from employee's directory
                 '*' = Excluded from both the operator's and employee's
                     directories
   BUDGET DEPT:  Three character department number for extensions in the
                 Administration Building.
   SUPPRESS:     '*' = Suppress details and totals for this extension on
                     'Outgoing Phone Call Usage by Extension' Report (All
                     information will be totaled into Department and Building).


   Press%END+to return.
)INIT
)PROC
)END

PHONTUT4.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
/* % TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(HIGH)              DEFAULTS DISPLAYED FOR */
/* + TYPE(TEXT  ) INTENS(LOW )                   INFORMATION ONLY  */
/* _ TYPE( INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON ) JUST(LEFT )               */
)BODY
%--------------------- Edit DELUXE Phone List Tutorial -------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD
+
   EXTENSION:    Key in Deluxe extension number or part of number
                 with a%*+suffix (E.G., 7033, 7*, 70*).
   PLANT:        Key in plant designation or part with a%*+suffix.
                 Acceptable values are:
                 ADM - Administration.        AEB  - Administration East.
                 DMT - Delmart Division.      FMS  - Forms Division.
                 FOX - Red Fox.               PAS  - Pascal.
                 PSB - Production Services.   REG8 - Region 8.
                 SHV - Shoreview Plant.       STP  - Saint Paul.
   LAST NAME:    Key in person's last name or part with a%*+suffix. To list
                 all names, key in%all+(E.G., JOHNSON, JOH*).
   FIRST NAME:   Key in person's first name or part with a%*+suffix.
   ROOM:         Key in a room or part with a%*+suffix. To list all rooms,
                 key in%all+(E.G., CAFETERIA, CAF*).

       Any combination of the above may be entered to produce a cross
   reference. The only exception is that NAME and ROOM entries may not
   be specified at the same time.

   Press%END+to return.
)INIT
)PROC
)END

)BODY

+  Date received%===>_DATERECV+ (MM/DD/YY, remove Date Ordered once received)
+
+AUDIT DATA:

+ Last update by : &LSTUWHO +  Date: &LSTUDAT +  Time: &LSTUTIM +
+
+

+
+
+
+
)INIT
 .ZVARS  = '(SLSSVER SLSSNUM LOCS)'

 .HELP = SLSST000
 &ATYPE = 'INPUT'
 &AINTENS = 'HIGH'
 &PNLTYP = '(Edit)'
 &A1 = '&SLSID         '
 &SLSID = TRUNC(&A1,9)
)PROC
 VER (&SLSID,NONBLANK)
 VER (&NAME1,NONBLANK)

 VER (&DATERECV,PICT,NN/NN/NN)

    VER(&DATERECV,LIST,' ')
)END

SLSSG000.text:
%----------------------------- TABLE OF CONTENTS ---------------------- TUTORIAL
%OPTION %===>_ZCMD                                                             +
+
%                   ---------------------------------------
                    |    INFORMATION SERVICES LIBRARY     |
                    |         GENERAL INFORMATION         |
                    ---------------------------------------
+
   The following topics are presented in sequence, or may be selected by
   entering a one-character selection code in the option field on line 2:
+
      %1+ Introduction
      %2+ Interacting with ISL











)PROC
   &ZSEL = TRANS(&ZCMD
                1,SLSSG100
                2,SLSSG200
                )
   &ZCONT = SLSSG100
   &ZUP = SLSST000
)END

SLSSG100.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+INTRODUCTION
 ------------

 The Information Services Library (ISL) is an interactive dialog application
 that you can use to aid in creating and maintaining a library.  ISL may
 be used to support an individual library or several libraries which can
 be accessed by a single or several users.


        Continued...











%INTRODUCTION+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG101
)END

SLSSG101.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+Major Functions
 ---------------

 Functions available to all users include:
     - BROWSE existing libraries.
     - PRINT listing of library.
     - KEYWORD SCANNING of libraries.
     - SCROLLING of data within library within the edit or browse function.
     - SPLIT SCREEN capability that allows you to partition the display screen.

 Functions available to authorized users include:
     - EDIT existing libraries.
     - CREATE new libraries.
     - DELETE entire library or selected entries within a library.
     - SORT library either in manual ID, binder or title sequence.
     - RESET library if abnormal termination of the dialog session occurs.
     - DEBUG capability that allows you to trace the session while in use.




%INTRODUCTION+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG200
)END

SLSSG200.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+INTERACTING WITH ISL
 --------------------

 This section tells you how to begin and end your ISL session, and how to use
 the display screen and terminal keys.


 Panel Displays
 --------------

 ISL communicates with you through a series of panels.  A PANEL is a prede-
 fined display image that is presented on a display terminal.  Panels may re-
 quire a response, and that response is used to determine the next panel to
 be displayed on the function to be performed.  Your responses may be in up-
 percase or lowercase.


        Continued...



%INTERACTING WITH ISL+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG201
)END

SLSSG201.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+Types of panels
 ---------------

 In using ISL, you will see the following basic types of panels:

    %Selection Panel+- You select from a list of options by typing its number
      or letter on the command/option line and pressing the ENTER key.   Se-
      lection panels are also called menus.

    %Entry Panel+- You supply information by filling in labeled fields.  In
      many cases fields are pre-entered based on what you last entered.

    %Manual/Library List+- Displays  a  list  of  manuals  available  within  a
      pre-selected  library  or a list of available libraries that can be se-
      lected.  These panels are scrollable by using the pre-defined PF keys or
      entering the scroll commands.

    %Scrollable Data Display+- Displays output listing from the report utility.


        Continued...
%INTERACTING WITH ISL+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG202
)END

SLSSG202.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+Panel Field Definitions
 -----------------------

 The following is an alphabetic list of fields displayed on Library Selection,
 Manual Selection, Browse and Edit panels.
    - CREATION DATE - is the date the library was created.
    - DATE ORDERED - is the date the manual was ordered.
    - DATE RECEIVED - is the date the manual was received after being ordered.
    - LAST MOD. DATE - is the date the library was modified.
    - LIBRARY NAME - is a user defined four character name to the library.
    - LIBRARY NUMBER - is a user defined field.  This is normally the library
      number supplied by IBM.
    - LIBRARY OWNER - is the user that owns the library.
    - LOCATION - supplies the location of the manual within the library.  This
      field  is  user  defined  and an understanding of the filing system used
      within the library may be required to aid in use of this field.
    - MANUAL ID - is the identification key of a manual.  This field is a
      UNIQUE key within the library.
    - O - indicates if the manual is on order.  If the manual is on order the
      field will contain a '*' else blank.

        Continued...
%INTERACTING WITH ISL+
)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG203
)END

SLSSG203.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+Panel Field Definitions (Continued)
 -----------------------

 The following is an alphabetic list of fields displayed on Library Selection,
 Manual Selection, Browse and Edit panels.
    - SORT SEQ. - is the sequence the library is sorted.  If the library has
      not been sorted this field will be blank.  The sequence is either B,
      M or T.  'B' indicates the library was sorted using binder number, 'M'
      indicates the Manual ID was used and 'T' indicates the first title line
      was used.
    - TITLE - this is the first or three title lines of the manual.
    - VER - version of the manual.  This field may be blank.
    - NUM - number of manuals in the library.

 CAUTION :  Use of an AMPERSAND '&&' is not supported within ISL.  If  the
 character is entered into any of the fields unpredictable results may occur.
 DO NOT use the ampersand character within ISL.


        Continued...

%INTERACTING WITH ISL+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG204
)END

SLSSG204.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+ISL Invocation
 --------------
 To invoke ISL, select option 5.12 from the 'DELUXE PRIMARY OPTIONS MENU'.
 The first panel to be displayed is the primary menu (see below).

 ------------ System Library Subscription Service ------------------------------
 OPTION   ===>

     1 - BROWSE    - Browse or inquire library               USERID - T99999
     2 - PRINT     - Library print functions                 TIME   - 16:44
     3 - SCAN      - Scan library with keyword(s)
     4 - ADMIN     - Administrative functions (You must be authorized)
     X - EXIT      - Terminate ISL


 Enter END key to terminate ISL




%INTERACTING WITH ISL+


)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG205
)END

SLSSG205.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+ISL Invocation
 --------------
 If you select options 2, 3 or 4 you get another selection panel with a
 secondary list of options. When selecting options 1 or 3 a library
 selection panel will be displayed to determine library to be processed.

 The ISL primary options are:
     1 - BROWSE   To display a selected library.
     2 - PRINT    To print the complete ISL library or any of the de-
              fined sub libraries. On-order list and binder labels may
              also be printed.
     3 - SCAN     Scan library using specific or generic keyword(s)
              to locate desired manuals.
     4 - ADMIN    Administrator functions for cross library processing
              (creating, deleting, sorting, compressing, building scan
              files and building sub libraries).
     X - EXIT     To exit from ISL.


%INTERACTING WITH ISL+



)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG207
)END

SLSSG206.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+ISL Invocation (Continued)
 --------------

 The ISL primary options (continued):
     5 - SCAN     Scan library using specific or generic keyword(s)
              to locate manual titles containing the search value.
              If a scan file does not exist for the selected
              library, you will be notified and one will have to be
              created by the library administrator. Once completed
              you may then re-invoke the scan option.
     6 - ADMIN    Administrator functions for cross library processing
              (creating, deleting, sorting, compressing, building scan
              files and building sub libraries).
     X - EXIT     To exit from ISL.


        Continued...




%INTERACTING WITH ISL+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSSG207
)END

 -----------------
 When options 1 or 3 are selected, the user will be prompted to select a
 library for processing. The library is selected by entering an 'S' before
 the library name and pressing enter on the library selection panel.

SLSSG209.text:
%----------------------------- GENERAL INFORMATION -------------------- TUTORIAL
+Split Screen
 ------------
 Split screen mode allows you to partition the display screen into two logical
 screens. The top and bottom screens are treated as though they were displayed
 on independent terminals.  This facility is available during a ISL session.

+Help Information
 ----------------
 The help function allows you obtain general information about a ISL options.
 Once in the tutorial, enter the END or RETURN command to return to the screen
 that was being viewed when the HELP command was originally entered.

+ISL Termination
 ---------------
 To terminate ISL, you select option X from the primary selection menu. The
 date and time of any changes will be saved and the sort sequence will be
 updated if the library was sorted.




%INTERACTING WITH ISL+

)PROC
    &ZUP = SLSSG000
    &ZCONT = SLSST000
)END

SLSSPRNT.text:
%------------ ISL (Print) -----------------------------------------------------
%COMMAND%===>_ZCMD
+
+REPORT TYPE:    %===>_Z+
+  %1+ Print complete MAIN library.
+  %2+ Print all libraries.
+  %3+ Print selected library.
+  %4+ Print on-order listing.
+  %5+ Print binder labels for an entire library.
+  %6+ Print selected binder labels for a library.
+  %7+ Print all manuals by location.
+
+REPORT SEQUENCE:%===>_Z+            (Default%M+)
+  %B+ Binder number order.    %M+ Manual ID order.    %T+ Manual Title order.
+
+PRINTER OPTION1:%===>_Z+  PRINTER OPTION2:%===>_Z+  PRINTER OPTION3:%===>_Z+
+  %1+ Xerox 9700 printer.   %D+ Double spacing.       %1+ 3-Hole punch.
+  %2+ IBM line printer.     %S+ Single spaceing.      %2+ Normal 8 1/2 X 11.
+      (Default%1+)              (Default%S+)              (Default%1+)
+
+
+Press%END+to terminate process+
+
)INIT
 .ZVARS = '(SLSSRPT SLSSSEQ SLSSPRT SLSSLINE SLSSFORM)'
 .CURSOR = SLSSRPT
 .HELP = SLSST000
 &ZCMD = &Z
 &SLSSRPT = &Z
)PROC
 VER (&SLSSRPT,NB,LIST,1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
 IF (&SLSSSEQ = ' ')
     &SLSSSEQ = M
 VER (&SLSSSEQ,NB,LIST,B,M,T)
 IF (&SLSSPRT = ' ')
     &SLSSPRT = 1
 VER (&SLSSPRT,NB,LIST,1,2)
 IF (&SLSSLINE = ' ')
     &SLSSLINE = S
 VER (&SLSSLINE,NB,LIST,D,S)
 IF (&SLSSFORM = ' ')
     &SLSSFORM = 1
 VER (&SLSSFORM,NB,LIST,1,2)
)END

SLSST000.text:
%----------------------------- TABLE OF CONTENTS ---------------------- TUTORIAL
%OPTION %===>_ZCMD                                                             +
+
%                   ---------------------------------------
                    |    INFORMATION SERVICES LIBRARY     |
                    |          TABLE OF CONTENTS          |
                    ---------------------------------------
+
   The following topics are presented in sequence, or may be selected by
   entering a one-character selection code in the option field on line 2:
+
      %G+ GENERAL     - General information about ISL
+
      %1+ BROWSE      - Browse or inquire library
      %2+ PRINT       - Print functions
      %3+ SCAN        - Scan library with keyword(s)
      %4+ ADMIN       - Administrative functions




)PROC
   &ZSEL = TRANS(&ZCMD
                G,SLSSG000
                1,SLSS1000
                2,SLSS2000
                3,SLSS3000
                4,SLSS4000
                )
   &ZCONT = SLSSG000
)END

SLSS1000.text:
%TUTORIAL ------------------------- BROWSE ---------------------------- TUTORIAL
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
%                     -----------------------------------
                      |             BROWSE              |
                      -----------------------------------

  %Browse+allows you to display data contained within a selected library in a
   full screen format.

   You can scroll the data in two directions (up or down) by a half page or
   full page, or by any number of lines.  Scrolling is performed by means of
   the scroll commands.

   The top right hand corner of the browse screen will supply the selected
   library name and sort sequence if sorted.

   Once a manual is located it can be selected by entering a 'S' in front of
   the Manual ID field.  Detail information will then be displayed for the
   selected manual.

                            (Continued on next page)

)INIT
   &ZCONT = SLSS1001
   &ZUP   = SLSST000
)END

SLSS1001.text:
%TUTORIAL ------------------------- BROWSE ---------------------------- TUTORIAL
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
%                             (BROWSE Continued)+

   You terminate browse by using the END command.

   If you are displaying detail data, END will take you back to the selection
   screen.

   If you are displaying the selection screen, END will take you back to the
   primary option menu.

)INIT
   &ZCONT = SLSS2000
   &ZUP   = SLSST000
)END

SLSS2000.text:
%TUTORIAL -------------------------- EDIT ----------------------------- TUTORIAL
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
%                     -----------------------------------
                      |              EDIT               |
                      -----------------------------------

  %Edit+allows you to modify or delete a selected manual.

   You must first select the manual that is to be edited from the selection
   screen.  Scrolling is performed by means of the Scroll command.

   The top right hand corner of the edit seletion screen will supply the
   library name and sort sequence if sorted.

   Locating a manual can be done one of two ways.  The user can scroll the
   selection screen until the manual is found and then select the manual or if
   the Manual ID is known the user can enter the ID in the Option field and
   press enter.  If the manual is located an automatic scroll of the  library
   will be performed and the manual will be the first one shown on the
   selection screen.  If not found the user will be notified by use of the
   caution screen.
                            (Continued on next page)
)INIT
   &ZCONT = SLSS2001
   &ZUP   = SLSST000
)END

SLSS2001.text:
%TUTORIAL -------------------------- EDIT ----------------------------- TUTORIAL
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
%                              (EDIT continued)+

+  Once located the manual can be selected for editing or the manual can be
   deleted from the library.

   Deleting the manual is done by placing a 'D' in front of the Manual ID
   field and pressing enter.  The user is then asked to confirm the request
   to delete the manual.  To confirm the request press enter or press the END
   key to cancel the request.



   You terminate edit by using the END command.

   If you are editing detail data, END will take you back to the selection
   screen.

   If you are displaying the selection screen, END will take you back to the
   primary option menu.

)INIT
   &ZCONT = SLSS2000
   &ZUP   = SLSST000
)END

TALLOC.text:
%TUTORIAL ---------------- DATA SET ALLOCATION SUMMARY ----------------TUTORIAL
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD

+The DATA SET ALLOCATION SUMMARY panel displays all data sets allocated
 to a user while logged on to TSO. Information displayed for each data
 set includes DDNAME, DATA SET NAME, DISPOSITION, DATA SET ORGANIZATION,
 RECORD FORMAT, LOGOCAL RECORD LENGTH, BLOCK SIZE and VOLUME SERIAL.

 Data sets with a disposition of TEMP are temporary files which are
 deleted at the end of the TSO session. Concatenated data sets are
 grouped together under a single DDNAME. Data set names which are
 greater than thirty characters in length are truncated and continued
 on the next line.

 The information displayed may be scrolled either up or down. Press
 END to terminate the display.
)END

TPLTCMP1.text:
%TUTORIAL ----------------- COMPARE UTILITY --------------------------- TUTORIAL
%COMMAND%===>_ZCMD                                                             +
+
% THE COMPARE UTILITY WILL OPTIONALLY CHANGE THE FORMAT OF A DATASET
% AND THEN COMPARE IT TO A CONTROL DATASET.
+
+ THE CONTROL FLOW OF THE UTILITY IS A FOLLOWS:
+    IF THE%FIRST START POSITION+FIELD IS NON-BLANK THE UTILITY
+    ASSUMES THAT YOU WISH TO CHANGE THE INPUT RECORD BEFORE COMPARE.
+    THE INPUT AND OUTPUT LRECL FIELDS%MUST+BE NON-BLANK.
+    THE UTILITY WILL THEN INVOKE%SYNCSORT+USING THE FOLLOWING
+    CONTROL CARDS:
%        SORT FIELDS=COPY
%        RECORD TYPE=F,LENGTH=(L1)   +(WHERE L1 = INPUT RECORD LENGTH)
%        OUTREC FIELDS=(P1,L1,P2,L2,P3,P3)
+                      WHERE P(N) = START POSITION (N) AND
+                      WHERE L(N) = FIELD LENGTH (N)
+    AFTER SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF%SYNCSORT+OR IMMEDIATELY IF THE
+    INPUT RECORD WAS NOT BEING CHANGED THE UTILITY WILL INVOKE THE
+    IBM UTILITY%IEBCOMPR+WITH SYSUT1 BEING THE DATASET NUMBERED%1+AND
+    SYSUT2 BEING THE DATASET NUMBERED%2+.  THE SYSPRINT OUTPUT FROM%IEBCOMPR+
+    (IF ANY) WILL THEN BE AVAILABLE FOR YOU TO BROWSE.
+
+                CONTINUED ON NEXT PAGE
)PROC
   &ZCONT=TPLTCMP2
)END

TPLTCMP2.text:
%TUTORIAL ----------------- COMPARE UTILITY --------------------------- TUTORIAL
%COMMAND%===>_ZCMD                                                             +
+
%                              CONTINUED
+
+    IF%IEBCOMPR+FINDS NO DIFFERENCES THE UTILITY WILL DISPLAY THE MESSAGE
+    %SUCCESSFUL COMPARE+ IN THE UPPER RIGHT HAND CORNER OF YOUR SCREEN.
+
+    IF THE%SORT FIELDS 1+OR%SORT FIELDS 2+FIELD IS NON-BLANK THE UTILITY
+    ASSUMES THAT YOU WISH TO CHANGE THE INPUT RECORD ORDER BEFORE COMPARE.
+    THE UTILITY WILL THEN SUBSTITUTE YOUR SORT FIELDS SPECIFICATIONS
+    INSTEAD OF ASSUMING FIELDS EQUALS COPY.  A SHORT EXAMPLE FOLLOWS.
+
+   SORT FIELDS 1         %===>
+    WILL GENERATE THE FOLLWING SORT CONTROL CARD:
%        SORT FIELDS=COPY
+
+   SORT FIELDS 1         %===> (1,2,A,6,2,A),FORMAT=CH
+    WILL GENERATE THE FOLLWING SORT CONTROL CARD:
%        SORT FIELDS=(1,2,A,6,2,A),FORMAT=CH
)END

  THE SYSLOG YOU WISH TO BROWSE CAN BE SELECTED BY TYPING AN 'S' NEXT TO
  THE PROPER CREATION DATE.  KEEP IN MIND THAT THE CREATION DATE IS USUALLY
  ONE DAY AFTER THE DATE OF THE SYSLOG.  (I.E. IF YOU WISH TO BROWSE THE
  SYSLOG FOR 84.107, YOU SHOULD PROBABLY LOOK AT THE ONE WITH A CREATION
  DATE OF 84.108.)


)PROC
)END

USRADD1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+¢)
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  ¢ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  { TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT) PAD('_')
)BODY
+---------------   DELUXE User Registration (ADD a RACF User)   ----------------
+COMMAND ===>¢ZCMD                                                            +
%
%User-id:{USERID  %      Owner:{OWNER   %      Default-group:{DFLTGRP %
%
%First Name / Only Name:{FNAME              %  Last Name:{LNAME               %
%
%Authority:{AUTHORTY%             Uacc:{UACC    +
%
%Attributes:{RACFATT0   %    {RACFATT1    %    {RACFATT2    %
%
%Data:{USERDATA                                                              %
%
%Phone Extension:{Z   %
%
%Select Region(s) in which to add user
%Reg1{Z%  Reg2{Z%  Reg3{Z%  Reg4{Z%  Reg5{Z%  Reg6{Z%  Reg7{Z%  Reg8{Z%  All{Z%
%
%TSO User:{Z%             (Enter+Y%to create TSO user)
%
%   Press+END%key to return to Selection Menu
%
)INIT
  .HELP = USRTUT06
  .ZVARS = '(EXTENS RACF1 RACF2 RACF3 RACF4 RACF5 RACF6 RACF7 RACF8 RAC+
               FA TSOUSER)'
  IF (&OWNER = &Z)
      &OWNER = 'SYS1'
  IF (&AUTHORTY = &Z)
      &AUTHORTY = 'USE'
  IF (&UACC = &Z)
      &UACC = 'NONE'
  IF (&RACFATT0 = &Z)
      &RACFATT0 = 'NOSPECIAL'
  IF (&RACFATT1 = &Z)
      &RACFATT1 = 'NOOPERATIONS'
  IF (&RACFATT2 = &Z)
      &RACFATT2 = 'NOAUDITOR'
  IF (&USERDATA = &Z)
      &USERDATA = 'ROOM='
  IF (&TSOUSER = &Z)
      &TSOUSER = 'N'
)PROC
  VER (&USERID,NONBLANK)
  VER (&DFLTGRP,NONBLANK)
  VER (&AUTHORTY,LIST,USE,CREATE,CONNECT,JOIN)
  VER (&UACC,LIST,ALTER,CONTROL,UPDATE,READ,NONE)
  VER (&RACFATT0,LIST,NOSPECIAL,SPECIAL)
  VER (&RACFATT1,LIST,NOOPERATIONS,OPERATIONS)
  VER (&RACFATT2,LIST,NOAUDITOR,AUDITOR)
  VER (&TSOUSER,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF1,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF2,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF3,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF4,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF5,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF6,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF7,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACF8,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&RACFA,LIST,N,Y)
  IF (&FNAME = &Z)
      &FNAME = 'UNKNOWN'
      &LNAME = &Z
  IF (&USERDATA = 'ROOM=    ')
      &USERDATA = &Z
  IF (&RACFA ¬= &Z)
      &RACF1 = Y
      &RACF2 = Y
      &RACF3 = Y
      &RACF4 = Y
      &RACF5 = Y
      &RACF6 = Y
      &RACF7 = Y
      &RACF8 = Y
  IF (&TSOUSER = Y)
      &TSO$ = Y
)END

USRADD2A.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+¢)
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  ¢ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  { TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT) PAD('_')
  } TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(RIGHT) PAD('_')
  < TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
)BODY
+---------------   DELUXE User Registration (ADD a TSO User)   -----------------
+COMMAND ===>¢ZCMD                                                            +
%
%User-id:<USERID  %
%
%Attributes:{TSOATT0 %  {TSOATT1 %  {TSOATT2 %  {TSOATT3 %    Dest:{TSODEST %
%
%Proc:{TSONAM0 %    Size:}TSOSIZ0 %K   Unit:{TSOUNT0 %    Maxsize:}TSOMAXR %K
%
%
%Select Region(s) in which to add user
%Reg1{Z%  Reg2{Z%  Reg3{Z%  Reg4{Z%  Reg5{Z%  Reg6{Z%  Reg7{Z%  Reg8{Z%  All{Z%
%
%
%   Press+ENTER%key to add TSO user; press+END%key to cancel request
%
%
%
%
%
%
%
%
)INIT
  .HELP = USRTUT07
  .ZVARS = '(TSO1 TSO2 TSO3 TSO4 TSO5 TSO6 TSO7 TSO8 TSOA)'
  .CURSOR = ZCMD
 IF (&TSOATT0 = &Z)
     &TSOATT0 = 'NOACCT'
 IF (&TSOATT1 = &Z)
     &TSOATT1 = 'NOJCL'
 IF (&TSOATT2 = &Z)
     &TSOATT2 = 'NOMOUNT'
 IF (&TSOATT3 = &Z)
     &TSOATT3 = 'NOOPER'
 IF (&TSODEST = &Z)
     &TSODEST = 'NODEST'
 IF (&TSONAM0 = &Z)
     &TSONAM0 = '$$$DFLT1'
 IF (&TSOSIZ0 = &Z)
     &TSOSIZ0 = '2048'
 IF (&TSOUNT0 = &Z)
     &TSOUNT0 = 'SYSTSO'
 IF (&TSOMAXR = &Z)
     &TSOMAXR = '4096'
 IF (&RACF1 = Y)
     &TSO1 = Y
 IF (&RACF2 = Y)
     &TSO2 = Y
 IF (&RACF3 = Y)
     &TSO3 = Y
 IF (&RACF4 = Y)
     &TSO4 = Y
 IF (&RACF5 = Y)
     &TSO5 = Y
 IF (&RACF6 = Y)
     &TSO6 = Y
 IF (&RACF7 = Y)
     &TSO7 = Y
 IF (&RACF8 = Y)
     &TSO8 = Y
)PROC
  VER (&TSOATT0,LIST,NOACCT,ACCT)
  VER (&TSOATT1,LIST,NOJCL,JCL)
  VER (&TSOATT2,LIST,NOMOUNT,MOUNT)
  VER (&TSOATT3,LIST,NOOPER,OPER)
  VER (&TSOSIZ0,RANGE,0,65535)
  VER (&TSO1,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO2,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO3,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO4,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO5,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO6,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO7,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSO8,LIST,N,Y)
  VER (&TSOA,LIST,N,Y)
  IF (&TSOMAXR = &Z)
      &TSOMAXR = 'NOLIM'
  IF (&TSOMAXR = 'NOLIM')
      &TSOMAXR = 0
  VER (&TSOMAXR,RANGE,0,65535)
  IF (&TSOMAXR = 0)
      &TSOMAXR = 'NOLIM'
  IF (&TSOA ¬= &Z)
      &TSO1 = Y
      &TSO2 = Y
      &TSO3 = Y
      &TSO4 = Y
      &TSO5 = Y
      &TSO6 = Y
      &TSO7 = Y
      &TSO8 = Y
  IF (&TSO1 = Y)
      IF (&RACF1 ¬= Y)
          &USRM01S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM01L = 'User will also be defined to region 1 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER001
          &RACF1 = Y
  IF (&TSO2 = Y)
      IF (&RACF2 ¬= Y)
          &USRM02S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM02L = 'User will also be defined to region 2 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER002
          &RACF2 = Y
  IF (&TSO3 = Y)
      IF (&RACF3 ¬= Y)
          &USRM03S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM03L = 'User will also be defined to region 3 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER003
          &RACF3 = Y
  IF (&TSO4 = Y)
      IF (&RACF4 ¬= Y)
          &USRM04S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM04L = 'User will also be defined to region 4 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER004
          &RACF4 = Y
  IF (&TSO5 = Y)
      IF (&RACF5 ¬= Y)
          &USRM05S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM05L = 'User will also be defined to region 5 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER005
          &RACF5 = Y
  IF (&TSO6 = Y)
      IF (&RACF6 ¬= Y)
          &USRM06S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM06L = 'User will also be defined to region 6 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER006
          &RACF6 = Y
  IF (&TSO7 = Y)
      IF (&RACF7 ¬= Y)
          &USRM07S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM07L = 'User will also be defined to region 7 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER007
          &RACF7 = Y
  IF (&TSO8 = Y)
      IF (&RACF8 ¬= Y)
          &USRM08S = 'Invalid specification'
          &USRM08L = 'User will also be defined to region 8 RACF.'
          .MSG = USER008
          &RACF8 = Y
)END

USRINQ2.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
      /*  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH)      defaults displayed for        */
      /*  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW)       information only              */
      /*  _ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)               */
  @ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) PAD(_) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS)
)BODY
+------------------------   DELUXE User RACF Inquiry   -------------------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                             +
%
+  Specify any combination of the following.
+  Enter entire string or part with%*+suffix.
+
+  User-id:@Z       +
+  Name - First / Only:@Z                   +    Last:@Z                   +
+  Owner:@Z       +     Default Group:@Z       +
+  Attributes:
+    Special / Nospecial:      @Z           +
+    Operations / Nooperations:@Z           +
+    Auditor / Noauditor:      @Z           +
+    Revoke                    @Z           +
+  Room Number@Z   +    Phone Extension@Z   +
+
+ Enter%Y+to indicate specific region(s).
+ Admin:@Z+Reg1:@Z+Reg2:@Z+Reg3:@Z+Reg4:@Z+Reg5:@Z+Reg6:@Z+Reg7:@Z+Reg8:@Z+
+
+
+   Press%END+key to return to Selection Menu
+
)INIT
  &ZLIST =  '(USERID FNAME LNAME OWNER DFLTGRP RACFATT0 RACFATT1 RACFAT+
               T2 RACFATT3 ROOM EXTENS RACF$ RACF1 RACF2 RACF3 RACF4 RA+
               CF5 RACF6 RACF7 RACF8)'
  .ZVARS = &ZLIST
  .HELP = USRTUT03
  .CURSOR = ZCMD
  &ZCMD = &Z
)PROC
  VER (&RACF$,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF1,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF2,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF3,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF4,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF5,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF6,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF7,LIST,Y)
  VER (&RACF8,LIST,Y)
)END

USRSELCT.text:
)ATTR
  +  TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  %  TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  ¢  TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH)
)BODY
%----------------   Deluxe User Registration Selection Panel   -----------------
%COMMAND ===>¢ZCMD                                                             +
%
%   1 +BROWSE   - Browse Deluxe User Information.
%   2 +ADD      - Add a User to the System.
%   3 +DELETE   - Delete a User from the System.
%   4 +UPDATE   - Update User's RACF information.
%
%
+   Press%END+key to return to Main Menu
%
)INIT
  .HELP = USRTUT00
  &ZCMD = &Z
)PROC
  &ZSEL = TRANS( TRUNC (&ZCMD,'.')
                1,'PGM(USRBROWS)'
                2,'PGM(USRADD1)'
                3,'PGM(USRDEL1)'
                4,'PGM(USRUPD1)'
              ' ',' '
                *,'?' )
)END

USRTSO1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+¢)
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  ¢ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  { TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS) PAD(' ')
)BODY
+-------------   DELUXE User List (TSO Account(s) for &USERID)   -------
+COMMAND ===>¢ZCMD
                                                                           %
%Select any region with an '*' before it.
%
%        {Z+0. +Admin
%        {Z+1. +Region 1
%        {Z+2. +Region 2
%        {Z+3. +Region 3
%        {Z+4. +Region 4
%        {Z+5. +Region 5
%        {Z+6. +Region 6
%        {Z+7. +Region 7
%        {Z+8. +Region 8
%
%  +Press%END+key to return
)INIT
  .HELP = TMCTUT00
  &VALID = N
  &ZCMD = &Z
  &T$ = &Z
  IF (&TSO$ = Y)
      &T$ = *
  &T1 = &Z
  IF (&TSO1 = Y)
      &T1 = *
  &T2 = &Z
  IF (&TSO2 = Y)
      &T2 = *
  &T3 = &Z
  IF (&TSO3 = Y)
      &T3 = *
  &T4 = &Z
  IF (&TSO4 = Y)
      &T4 = *
  &T5 = &Z
  IF (&TSO5 = Y)
      &T5 = *
  &T6 = &Z
  IF (&TSO6 = Y)
      &T6 = *
  &T7 = &Z
  IF (&TSO7 = Y)
      &T7 = *
  &T8 = &Z
  IF (&TSO8 = Y)
      &T8 = *
  &ZLIST = '(T$ T1 T2 T3 T4 T5 T6 T7 T8)'
  .ZVARS = &ZLIST
)PROC
  &TSONUM = TRUNC (&ZCMD,1)
  IF (&TSONUM = 0)
      IF (&T$ = *)
          &VALID = Y
          &TSONUM = $
  IF (&TSONUM = 1)
      IF (&T1 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 2)
      IF (&T2 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 3)
      IF (&T3 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 4)
      IF (&T4 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 5)
      IF (&T5 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 6)
      IF (&T6 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 7)
      IF (&T7 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  IF (&TSONUM = 8)
      IF (&T8 = *)
          &VALID = Y
  VER (&VALID,LIST,Y)
)END

USRUPD1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+¢)
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  ¢ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  { TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS) PAD(' ')
  ¬ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS) PAD('_')
)BODY
+--------------------   DELUXE User List (Update a User)   ---------------------
+COMMAND ===>¢ZCMD                                    +SCROLL ===>¢AMT +
+
%  Select:+S%- Update a user
+
+SEL     USER-ID               NAME              ROOM     EXT      NCCF    TSO
+---     --------      --------------------      ----     ----     ----    ---
)MODEL
 ¬Z+    {Z       +    {Z                   +    {Z   +   {Z   +    {Z+     {Z+
)INIT
 .HELP = USRTUT09
 &ZLIST = '(LCMD USERID NAME ROOM EXTENS NCCFUSER TSOUSER)'
 .ZVARS = &ZLIST
 &AMT = PAGE
 &LCMD = &Z
)PROC
  VER (&LCMD,LIST,S)
)END

USRUPD3A.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+¢)
  % TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  ¢ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)
  { TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS) PAD('_')
  } TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(LOW) CAPS(ON) JUST(ASIS)
)BODY
+--------------   DELUXE User List (RACF Profile for &USERID)   ---------------
+COMMAND ===>¢ZCMD
+
+Admin:}Z+Reg1:}Z+Reg2:}Z+Reg3:}Z+Reg4:}Z+Reg5:}Z+Reg6:}Z+Reg7:}Z+Reg8:}Z+
+Name - First:{Z                   +Last:{Z                   +Owner:{Z       +
+Revoke Date:{Z       +  Resume Date:{Z       +  Default-Group:{Z       +
+Attributes:{Z           +        {Z           +        {Z           +
+           }Z           +
+Data:{Z
+Extension:{Z   +
+ Connect Group    Group Authority    Group Uacc    Revoke Date    Resume Date
+   {UPDGRP1 +        {UPDAUTH1+      {UPDUACC1+     {UPDREV1 +     {UPDRES1 +
+   {UPDGRP2 +        {UPDAUTH2+      {UPDUACC2+     {UPDREV2 +     {UPDRES2 +
+   {UPDGRP3 +        {UPDAUTH3+      {UPDUACC3+     {UPDREV3 +     {UPDRES3 +
+   {UPDGRP4 +        {UPDAUTH4+      {UPDUACC4+     {UPDREV4 +     {UPDRES4 +
+   {UPDGRP5 +        {UPDAUTH5+      {UPDUACC5+     {UPDREV5 +     {UPDRES5 +
+   {UPDGRP6 +        {UPDAUTH6+      {UPDUACC6+     {UPDREV6 +     {UPDRES6 +
+   {UPDGRP7 +        {UPDAUTH7+      {UPDUACC7+     {UPDREV7 +     {UPDRES7 +
+   {UPDGRP8 +        {UPDAUTH8+      {UPDUACC8+     {UPDREV8 +     {UPDRES8 +
+   {UPDGRP9 +        {UPDAUTH9+      {UPDUACC9+     {UPDREV9 +     {UPDRES9 +
+   {UPDGRPA +        {UPDAUTHA+      {UPDUACCA+     {UPDREVA +     {UPDRESA +
+
+  &MESSAGE
)INIT
 .HELP = USRTUT10
 &ZLIST = '(R$ R1 R2 R3 R4 R5 R6 R7 R8 UPDFNAM UPDLNAM UPDOWNR UPDREV U+
               PDRES UPDDFLT UPDRAT0 UPDRAT1 UPDRAT2 RACFATT3 UPDDATA U+
               PDEXT)'
 .ZVARS = &ZLIST
 &ZCMD = &Z
 &R$ = &Z
 &R1 = &Z
 &R2 = &Z
 &R3 = &Z
 &R4 = &Z
 &R5 = &Z
 &R6 = &Z
 &R7 = &Z
 &R8 = &Z
 IF (&UPDRACF$ = Y)
     &R$ = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF1 = Y)
     &R1 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF2 = Y)
     &R2 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF3 = Y)
     &R3 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF4 = Y)
     &R4 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF5 = Y)
     &R5 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF6 = Y)
     &R6 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF7 = Y)
     &R7 = '*'
 IF (&UPDRACF8 = Y)
     &R8 = '*'
 &TODAY = '&ZMONTH/&ZDAY/&ZYEAR'
 &VALDFLT = NO
)PROC
  &USRM01S = 'Invalid value'
  &USRM01L = 'Enter an ''*'' to add a regional user or a '' '' to delet+
               e a user from a region.'
  VER (&R$,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R1,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R2,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R3,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R4,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R5,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R6,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R7,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  VER (&R8,LIST,' ','*',MSG=USER001)
  IF (&R$ = ' ')
      &UPDRACF$ = N
  IF (&R$ = '*')
      &UPDRACF$ = Y
  IF (&R1 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF1 = N
  IF (&R1 = '*')
      &UPDRACF1 = Y
  IF (&R2 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF2 = N
  IF (&R2 = '*')
      &UPDRACF2 = Y
  IF (&R3 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF3 = N
  IF (&R3 = '*')
      &UPDRACF3 = Y
  IF (&R4 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF4 = N
  IF (&R4 = '*')
      &UPDRACF4 = Y
  IF (&R5 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF5 = N
  IF (&R5 = '*')
      &UPDRACF5 = Y
  IF (&R6 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF6 = N
  IF (&R6 = '*')
      &UPDRACF6 = Y
  IF (&R7 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF7 = N
  IF (&R7 = '*')
      &UPDRACF7 = Y
  IF (&R8 = ' ')
      &UPDRACF8 = N
  IF (&R8 = '*')
      &UPDRACF8 = Y
  IF (&UPDREV ¬= &REVOKE)
      IF (&UPDREV ¬= &Z)
          &USRM04S = 'Invalid REVOKE date'
          &USRM04L = 'REVOKE date must be of the form ''&TODAY''.'
          VER (&UPDREV,PICT,NN/NN/NN,MSG=USER004)
  IF (&UPDRES ¬= &RESUME)
      IF (&UPDRES ¬= &Z)
          &USRM07S = 'Invalid RESUME date'
          &USRM07L = 'RESUME date must be of the form ''&TODAY''.'
          VER (&UPDRES,PICT,NN/NN/NN,MSG=USER007)
  IF (&UPDRAT0 ¬= &RACFATT0)
      IF (&UPDRAT0 ¬= &Z)
          &USRM11S = 'Invalid RACF Attribute'
          &USRM11L = 'Valid values for this attribute are: SPECIAL and +
               NOSPECIAL.'
          VER (&UPDRAT0,LIST,SPECIAL,NOSPECIAL,MSG=USER011)
      IF (&UPDRAT0 = &Z)
          &UPDRAT0 = NOSPECIAL
  IF (&UPDRAT1 ¬= &RACFATT1)
      IF (&UPDRAT1 ¬= &Z)
          &USRM12S = 'Invalid RACF Attribute'
          &USRM12L = 'Valid values for this attribute are: OPERATIONS a+
               nd NOOPERATIONS.'
          VER (&UPDRAT1,LIST,OPERATIONS,NOOPERATIONS,MSG=USER012)
      IF (&UPDRAT1 = &Z)
          &UPDRAT1 = NOOPERATIONS
  IF (&UPDRAT2 ¬= &RACFATT2)
      IF (&UPDRAT2 ¬= &Z)
          &USRM13S = 'Invalid RACF Attribute'
          &USRM13L = 'Valid values for this attribute are: AUDITOR and +
               NOAUDITOR.'
          VER (&UPDRAT2,LIST,AUDITOR,NOAUDITOR,MSG=USER013)
      IF (&UPDRAT2 = &Z)
          &UPDRAT2 = NOAUDITOR
  IF (&UPDAUTH1 ¬= &Z)
      IF (&UPDGRP1 ¬= &Z)
          &USRM15S = 'Invalid group AUTHORITY'
          &USRM15L = 'Valid values are: JOIN, CONNECT, CREATE & USE.'

+

+
+
+
